snippet.title: DESOLATIUM: PROLOGUE - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
DESOLATIUM: PROLOGUE is a first-person point & click Graphic Adventure based on Lovecraft Mythos. Explore this distressing psychological thriller full of terror, mystery and puzzles, where you will get to know how everything started.

Live the most immersive DESOLATIUM experience with the VR version (Oculus Rift, Oculus Quest and HTC VIVE) or enjoy a more classic experience without virtual reality (PC / Mac).

Available on Steam:

➡ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1640540/Desolatium_Prologue/?utm_source=youtube⬅

Follow us:

Facebook → https://www.facebook.com/desolatium
Instagram → https://www.instagram.com/desolatium/
Twitter → https://www.twitter.com/desolatium
Web → http://desolatium.com/
